name: Italian Adventure
description: This is an 8 nights, 9 days trip in which I'll personally guide through the heart of Italy, we'll stay at one of Italy's music legends property, visit a local mountain brewery, horseback ride and glider flight or mountain bike in one of the most beautiful valleys of Italy. We will visit the mysterious undergrounds of the medieval town of Rieti and we'll do some Florence walking and Fiorentina steak eating as well !
